statements: DELETE FROM cross_docking_delays WHERE reason = 'Unforeseen circumstances' AND warehouse_id = '0134e956-1c2b-43d8-8a84-d861f5a7edf9';
DELETE FROM cross_docking_delays WHERE delay_minutes > 30 AND reason = 'late delivery';
DELETE FROM Bottlenecks WHERE resolution_status = FALSE
DELETE FROM CrossDockDelays WHERE delay_reason = 'Shipping delays';
DELETE FROM Bottlenecks WHERE bottleneck_id = 101 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM bottleneck_details WHERE bottleneck_id = 3 AND bottleneck_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM cross_docking_delays WHERE id = 1 AND delay_duration > 5
DELETE FROM inefficiencies WHERE inefficiency_type = 'Waiting' AND inefficiency_description LIKE '%inefficient%' AND process_id = 10;
